newsitem.title: USA: Delphi Information closing Westlake office.
newsitem.headline: Delphi Information closing Westlake office.

text.p: Delphi Information Systems Inc said Thursday it is closing its Westlake Village, Calif., office and consolidating that facility's operations into its Walnut Creek, Calif. location.
The Westlake facility represented more than one-third of Delphi's annual rent outlay and was the highest cost facility per square foot and per person.

Delphi, which provides integrated business systems to property and casualty insurance companies, said the consolidation, expected to be completed by April, will leave it with three support locations -- east, midwest and west.
